revision.text: ==Detective Pikachu== '''Note:''' After fulfilling the prerequisites, this quest can be accepted in the Bulletin Board in [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Vaniville Town]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Detective Pikachu ! Type !! Requirement !! Reward |- | Prerequisite || Capture [[Wandering Pokemon|Detective Pikachu]] [[File:Detective Pikachu.png|30px]] and defeat [[Gyms#Kalos|Santalune City Gym]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Search for clues in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battle || Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Aipom Alley]] [[File:Aipom Alley.png|30px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || N/A |- | Clear Dungeon || Clear [[Radio Tower]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Meet with the Informant in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battle || Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Mime Interview]] [[File:Mr. Mime.png|30px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to the Informant in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battle || Infiltrate the [[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Underground Fighting Ring]] [[File:Veteran (male).png|30px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Pacifidlog Town]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Howard Clifford in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Lucy Stevens in [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] || N/A |- | Clear Dungeon || Clear [[P2 Laboratory]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battle || Fight the [[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Lab Ambush]] [[File:Lab Ambush.png|30px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Mewtwo in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Howard Clifford in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battle || Defeat the [[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Imposter]] [[File:Imposter.png|30px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Howard Clifford in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battle || Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Possessed Mewtwo]] [[File:Mewtwo.png|30px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Mewtwo in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Detective Raichu in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Detective Raichu [[File:Detective Raichu.png|30px]] |}
